name: M&T Bank Corporation - Series H Preferred Stock
description: M&T Bank Corporation is a leading financial services company headquartered in Buffalo, New York. Founded in 1856, M&T Bank is known for providing a broad range of financial products and services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. The company operates through a network of branches and ATMs primarily in the northeastern United States, offering services such as personal banking, commercial banking, investment management, and mortgage lending. M&T Bank has built a strong reputation for customer service and community involvement, making it one of the top regional banks in the nation. The Series H Preferred Stock represents a specific class of equity that provides investors with fixed dividend payments, reflecting M&T Bank's ability to deliver consistent returns. The bank's commitment to prudent risk management and strong capital position has been integral to its success, and it continues to focus on sustainable growth and enhancing shareholder value. With a strategic focus on technology, M&T Bank is also investing in digital banking solutions to improve customer experience and operational efficiency. As a member of the S&P 500, M&T Bank is well-positioned in the competitive financial services landscape, offering stability and reliability to both its customers and investors.

seo.meta_title: M&T Bank Corporation | Financial Services & Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore M&T Bank Corporation, a leading provider of financial services in the northeastern US. Discover our banking products, investment solutions, and commitment to customer service.

faq.question: What services does M&T Bank offer?
faq.answer: M&T Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of M&T Bank?
faq.answer: René F. Jones is the CEO of M&T Bank Corporation.

faq.question: Where is M&T Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: M&T Bank is headquartered in Buffalo, New York, USA.
